list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /$vim_name/ WITH KEY = "ns_uuid"
list.label: NS
list.name: ns_uuid
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /$vim_name/ WITH KEY = "ns_uuid"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /$vim_name/ WITH KEY = "vdu_uuid"  WHERE ns_uuid=~/$ns_uuid/
list.label: VDU
list.name: vdu_uuid
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /$vim_name/ WITH KEY = "vdu_uuid"  WHERE ns_uuid=~/$ns_uuid/
